name: RPS Runner
description: RPS Runner is a simple runner game where you have to choose the correct object from Rock, Paper or Scissors in order to defeat the on-coming objects.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB, Intel Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core 2 duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB, Nvidia Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
